name: VIRUS
description: Was ist los mein freunde? Would you like to turn off the lights?? hmmm... your choice pal. This level based on American football field (i guess). And it's really GREAT HUGE area for 8 players, i hope you can survive from the frags. Also, there's a great-secret place for finding the BFG and be amred. Turn up the lights or not...again your choice.. Hope you enjoyed and i'll see you in the heaven! I hope you leave f-cking non-spam comments... Rot in heaven! And... DooM rules!!! <3
